---
title: "About"
---

This is a tutorial site for orderly; it uses [`orderly2`](https://mrc-ide.githubio/orderly2), which should become version 2.0.0 of orderly on CRAN early 2025.

```{r}
#| include: false
pkgs <- c("orderly2", "cli", "fs", "gert", "httr2", "jsonlite", "openssl",
          "rlang", "withr", "yaml", "jsonvalidate")
for (p in pkgs) {
  loadNamespace(p)
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Built using `orderly2` version `r packageVersion("orderly2")`

Rendered on `r Sys.time()` using quarto `r quarto::quarto_version()`

Full system information:

```{r}
sessioninfo::session_info()
```
